amendment.description: To extend section 145 (c) of the Aviation and Transportation Security Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3864 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3864 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) To extend section 145 (c) of the Aviation and Transportation Security Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3864 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3864 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist.
